title: 5.4 discussion
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-54-notes

Thoughts on Veigar changes (personal opinon complete BS)

Share thoughts

replies.body: I just played him and he is freaking awesome went 17/6. You just lead your e now which is fine. But the q and w and r holy %%%% so much damage. Lower Cds as well. So fun.
Agreed.. I think i concluded that way to early.. Yeah his E is Harder to land but Holy sweet jesus... That Q stacks are real

usually when people make threads like this, they have something they want to talk about. Sharing their own thoughts and getting opinions. Seems like you made this just so you could try and have a "popular thread" for some reason.

I just wanted to see what other people have to say, Yes I have my own thoughts but i wanted to know what others were thinking and if they think that the patches are necessary. 

For example

I think the changes on Veigar are ridiculous (coming from and old Veigar main)

But i think the changes on Kat are necessary.

I just wanted to know if anyone else was thinking along the same line of this.
